inputs.selection_motivation: Euro area inflation directly influences the value of the euro, as higher inflation erodes purchasing power and pressures monetary policy, making the currency a natural downstream effect of inflation dynamics.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Euro Area Inflation is directly influenced by monetary policy, currency movements, commodity prices, and broader macroeconomic trends.
